ast.name: TouchDevelop Junior
ast.comment: A simplified version of TouchDevelop, written in TouchDevelop!

thenBody.text: move robot to its new position
at the end of a statement sequence, need to move up the tree to find what to do next

body.text: * should we have trace cursor separate from instruction cursor?
* live mode: execute until inst cursor reached * consistent use of instruction cursor in live mode
* Tie board size to active feature set
* putting limits on size of program, # of primitives (power meter)
-	Needs sounds to take it to the next level (what about a block to make the robot fart  kids would love it)

thenBody.text: TODO: need to revisit the logic of how much trace to replay after a change
